description: More than 50,000 crores worth of fruits and vegetables are wasted every year in India due to the lack of proper cold storage facilities. Temperate has installed solar-powered village-level pack houses or small cold rooms that can help in solving these problems.
tasks: Led the product team and presented the deliverables on time.
Solidified the user experience on the existing website platform.
Simplified the data extraction and backup processes to and from the AWS database.
Developed the accompanying Android App from the ground up to replicate the website's UI.
Documented the platform's user stories to aid the stakeholders.
